Abstract: It was late afternoon in Hoboken, N.J. He was wearing a plastic, cobalt-colored top hat advertising ''Millennium 2000.'' She was donning a pair of plastic, glow-in-the-dark glasses proclaiming ''2000.'' And together, Jeff and Stacy Vitale looked like they were primed for a party for the ages tonight.    Their destination? Not Times Square, since they had worked all day in Midtown Manhattan, buying the millennial gear along the way.
LeadParagraph: It was late afternoon in Hoboken, N.J. He was wearing a plastic, cobalt-colored top hat advertising ''Millennium 2000.'' She was donning a pair of plastic, glow-in-the-dark glasses proclaiming ''2000.'' And together, Jeff and Stacy Vitale looked like they were primed for a party for the ages tonight.

Headline.Main: Primed for a Seat In Front of the Tube
Headline.PrintHeadline: 1/1/00: A PEACEFUL PARTY; Primed for a Seat In Front of the Tube
